official_title: To make technical corrections regarding the effect of provisions relating to the eligibility of certain insular areas for assistance under the HOME Investment Partnerships Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Cranston-Gonzalez National Affordable Housing Act with regard to HOME investment partnership assistance for certain insular areas.
